overview: Following the footsteps of the seasons, a journey begins. Feel the movement of the drifting clouds, witnessing the colours of the wind, velvety blue skies of mellow red summers. The two have different hopes and dreams, different directions and goals. But what that is in common is the adventure they had and the memories they shared. The awe of nature, the picturesque sceneries and the unique structures nailed onto the ground. An adventure brings them together, an adventure brings them home.
title: Wandering With NONO And PUPU
